Fokker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a type of military aircraft used by the Germans in World War I and designed by Anthony Fokker (1890â€“1939), a Dutch aircraft designer who later moved to the US and made planes for the US aircraft industry
Fokker.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a type of plane made by the US company Fokker. Its best-known aircraft is the Fokker Friendship.
